Contact US

Zero Adulteration - We sell what we eat from farm

We are here to create an impact on society and help people learn about Natural farming practices and conserve the Sampradhaya. Come over to learn about natural farming. We have a seed library of heirlooms. We also sell our farm produce from the farm. We are also interested in learning about the best practices available in the vedhas, which will us improve our health.
